name: Slendytubbies: Scratched Television
description:
After the red teletubby died, you decided to look for custards but there's single problem. The cause was due to... Him.

Slendytubbies: Scratched Television is a demake of the Slendytubbies series, created in Turbowarp. With help of that "same slender-shrek game's spinoffs".
